ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You look strapping as usual today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Lana’s here to soothe your soul,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Here, you can have this if you like.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
I just fished that up with a Lana original fishing
rod. It’s as fresh as it gets!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
No need to thank me. Just showing my gratitude
for all the times you’ve helped.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here’s a wonderful present for the always
wonderful [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I was worried it might not suit your taste...
But you look pleased after all.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2103_03_10: And that makes me happy, too!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Why don’t we have a chat?
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’d like to hear what you have to say,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I’ve been saving up some great stories for you.
Just wait—you’ll be surprised!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2302_01_10: For me? Heh, thanks so much.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Oh my... You’re giving this to me?
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
You reeled me right in with your fantastic present,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
That was fun. Let’s do it again when you’ve some
free time!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Wow, we really got lost in conversation.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8201_2401_02_10: I could feel my heart being reeled right in!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This place seems to soothe the mind and body of
everyone who comes here.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
Soon I’ll be so refreshed, I’ll be a strapping
new Lana!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
Just like with fishing, there’s a lot more to making
fishing rods than you see on the surface.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
If you start trying to make better rods for bigger
and better catches, you’ll be spiraling before you
know it.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Heh heh... Once you’ve taken interest in the world
of fishing, it’s hard to give up!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
The whole world’s connected by ocean, so any big
catch you can imagine could appear in the sea
around Pasio.
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
Let’s go fishing from time to time, imagining our
battle against some big catch!
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
And if we ever see vigorous splashing in
Pasio’s seas...
ch0160_00_suiren_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I’ll probably be so moved, I’ll cry too hard to see!
So you better help me out!
